title: The Night Circus
author: Erin Morgenstern
description: A magical circus and dueling magicians. Morgenstern's debut novel is enchanting and mesmerizing.

title: The Goldfinch
author: Donna Tartt
description: Theo Decker's life changes after surviving an explosion. Tartt won a Pulitzer for this novel.

title: Normal People
author: Sally Rooney
description: Explores the intricate relationship between Marianne and Connell. Rooney's contemporary love story.

title: Pachinko
author: Min Jin Lee
description: Multi-generational saga of a Korean family in Japan. Lee's novel is a poignant historical epic.

title: Gone Girl
author: Gillian Flynn
description: A wife's disappearance turns sinister. Flynn's psychological thriller keeps readers on edge.

title: The Girl with the Dragon Tattoo
author: Stieg Larsson
description: Journalist and hacker delve into dark family secrets. Larsson's gripping mystery.

title: Big Little Lies
author: Liane Moriarty
description: Friendship and domestic issues with a twist. Moriarty's novel is both suspenseful and insightful.

title: The Silent Patient
author: Alex Michaelides
description: A woman accused of murder stops speaking. Michaelides' psychological thriller is compelling.

title: Pride and Prejudice
author: Jane Austen
description: Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy's love story. Austen's classic romance.

title: Me Before You
author: Jojo Moyes
description: A caregiver and a paralyzed man form a bond. Moyes' touching love story.

title: The Notebook
author: Nicholas Sparks
description: Enduring love between Noah and Allie. Sparks' heartfelt romance spans decades.

title: Outlander
author: Diana Gabaldon
description: Time-traveling nurse in 18th-century Scotland. Gabaldon's historical romance.

title: The Name of the Wind
author: Patrick Rothfuss
description: The legendary Kvothe's adventures. Rothfuss' epic fantasy.

title: Dune
author: Frank Herbert
description: Desert planet politics and religion. Herbert's sci-fi classic.

title: The Hunger Games
author: Suzanne Collins
description: Katniss Everdeen in a deadly competition. Collins' dystopian sci-fi.

title: Good Omens
author: Neil Gaiman and Terry Pratchett
description: Angel and demon team up to stop apocalypse. Gaiman and Pratchett's comedic fantasy.

title: Sapiens: A Brief History of Humankind
author: Yuval Noah Harari
description: Explores Homo sapiens' impact on the world. Harari's historical analysis.

title: Educated
author: Tara Westover
description: Memoir of a woman escaping her strict upbringing. Westover's inspiring story.

title: Becoming
author: Michelle Obama
description: Memoir of the former First Lady of the US. Obama's impactful narrative.

title: The Immortal Life of Henrietta Lacks
author: Rebecca Skloot
description: Henrietta Lacks' cells revolutionized medicine. Skloot's investigative biography.
